thread.title: Samsung sets March 29 for Galaxy S8 launch
thread.title_full: Samsung sets March 29 for Galaxy S8 launch

title: Samsung sets March 29 for Galaxy S8 launch
text:
Tuesday, 28 February 2017 | MYT 10:03 AM Samsung sets March 29 for Galaxy S8 launch Coming up: Samsung showed a short video clip announcing the date for its traditional "Unpacked Event". Pictured is David Lowes, chief marketing officer of Samsung Europe— Reuters 
BARCELONA: Samsung Electronics said it would launch its next key device, the Galaxy S8, on March 29. 
At the end of a product presentation at Mobile World Congress in Barcelona, the company showed a short video clip announcing the date for its traditional "Unpacked Event". 
In past years, the trade fair was the scene of major Samsung launches. This year, Samsung postponed the presentation of its next major handset. — Reuters <>
